attributes.additional_details: Because to take away cash would mean taking away our rights, freedom of choice and civil liberties, not to mention our right to privacy.
attributes.background: We want the government to reconsider eliminating cash and taking away our civil rights and freedom of choice. We the people want to keep cash as a choice of payment.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action:

Require all retailers and businesses to accept cash for goods and services
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/588814
